entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
